title: Strong Coupling Phase of Chiral Gross Neveu Model
abstract: We perform the numerical simulation of the two dimensional chiral Gross Neveu model using the Kogut-Susskind(KS) fermion. In the case of SU(4), the Kosterlitz-Thouless phase transition happens at some critical value of the coupling constant. In the case of one flavour, there exists the strong coupling phase in which the correlation functions vanish and the general covariance is realized in the quantum field thoery through the dynamical process.
